Welcome to “Mental Movement,” the mindse: Welcome to “Mental Movement,” the mindset app designed especially for athletes. At “Mental Movement,” we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your data when you use our app.
By using the “Mental Movement” app, you: By using the “Mental Movement” app, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. Please take the time to read and understand this policy. If you do not agree with our practices, please do not use the app.
Personal Information: We may collect per: Personal Information: We may collect personal information, including your name, email address, and demographic information, when you create an account or contact us for support.
Usage Data: We collect data about your i: Usage Data: We collect data about your interactions with the app, such as the features you use, the content you view, and your device information (e.g., device type, operating system, and IP address).
User-Generated Content: Any content you: User-Generated Content: Any content you voluntarily submit to the app, such as comments, posts, or journal entries, may be collected and stored.
Payment Information: If you make in-app: Payment Information: If you make in-app purchases, we may collect payment information, including credit card details, to facilitate the transaction.
We use your information for the followin: We use your information for the following purposes:
Personalization: To provide you with a p: Personalization: To provide you with a personalized experience, including content recommendations and goal tracking.
Communication: To send you updates, noti: Communication: To send you updates, notifications, and support messages regarding the app.
Customer Support: To respond to your inq: Customer Support: To respond to your inquiries and provide assistance.
Marketing: With your consent, we may sen: Marketing: With your consent, we may send you promotional materials and newsletters. You can opt out at any time.
We may share your information in the fol: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
With Your Consent: We may share your inf: With Your Consent: We may share your information when you give us explicit consent to do so.
Service Providers: We may share your inf: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services.
Legal Obligations: We may share your inf: Legal Obligations: We may share your information to comply with legal obligations, such as responding to legal requests and preventing fraud.
We take data security seriously. We impl: We take data security seriously. We implement reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
You have the following rights regarding: You have the following rights regarding your information:
Access and Correction: You can access an: Access and Correction: You can access and update your personal information through your app settings.
Data Deletion: You can request the delet: Data Deletion: You can request the deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us.
Marketing Communications: You can opt ou: Marketing Communications: You can opt out of marketing communications by following the instructions provided in our emails or by contacting us.
“Mental Movement” is intended for users: “Mental Movement” is intended for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect or maintain information from children under 13 years of age.
We may update this Privacy Policy to ref: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy in the app.
If you have questions or concerns about: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at [info@mental-movement.de].
By using the “Mental Movement” app, you: By using the “Mental Movement” app, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms and conditions.
